    <datafield ind1=" " ind2=" " tag="260">
      <subfield code="a">New York, NY :</subfield>

    <datafield ind1="0" ind2="0" tag="505">
      <subfield code="t">Rattlesnake Creek.</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">After the flood ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">North fork ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Tracks in snow ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">South fork ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Unfinished cabin above the creek ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Out of the blue --</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Aunt Bea's Trailer:</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Final tryout this Saturday noon ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">The Lakeview weekly neighbor ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Tangerines in L.A. ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">1965 ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Crazy snow ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Vietnam ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Charlotte Harkness, July 1876 ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Aunt Bea's trailer --</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Boiling a watch.</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Stunning, he thought that morning ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">A rusted piece of German barbed wire ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">German man on the train to Munich ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Car camping in the Ozarks ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Second Bull Run ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Capture of a Confederate soldier ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Against optimism ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">The day the war began ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Boiling a watch --</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">The scar on Yeats' cheek.</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Can murderers lead successful lives? ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Five angry little songs ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Falling asleep next to my fountain pen ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Star chart goes missing ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">The present ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">To the future ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">The language of the dead ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Elaboration on a statement by Frost ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">The scar on Yeats' cheek --</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Telescope in the basement:</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Nelson Bentley sitting alone in Savery Hall ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Tour of Kilmainham gaol ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">KÃ¶ln Cathedral ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Telescope in the basement ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">The aging body ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Syringa in twilight ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Beautiful passing lives --</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Why we hike to the duck marsh.</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Replacing her brakes ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Another note to my sons ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Lao Wang ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Mountain Ash berries ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Spiders, late September ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">One less fall ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Burrows Mountain ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">The man who made my belt ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Late middle ages ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Jock itch ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Abandoned igloo ;</subfield>
      <subfield code="t">Why we hike to the duck marsh.</subfield>
    </datafield>
